attributes.action: Petition to: cease the Anonymity of the killers of James Patrick Bulger.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The innocent 2 year old boy was murdered in liverpool and the evil killers were released to a life of luxury. we must stop this madness and stop the anonymity of these evil people!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
